#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	string s;
	cin>>t;
	while(t-->0)
	{
		cin>>s;
		int small[26]={0},caps[26]={0},sum=0,i;
		for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			if(s[i]>=97&&s[i]<=122)
			small[s[i]-'a']++;
			else
			caps[s[i]-'A']++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(small[i]%2==0)
			sum=sum+(small[i]/2);
			else
			sum=sum+(small[i]/2)+1;
			if(caps[i]%2==0)
			sum=sum+(caps[i]/2);
			else
			sum=sum+(caps[i]/2)+1;
		}
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
}
